issue.title: [Rust] upgrade dependency "flatbuffers" to 0.8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10938](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10938). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[flatbuffers](<https://crates.io/crates/flatbuffers>) 0.8.0 was released on Dec 10, 2020, with some notable changes:

verifier
 common rust traits to FlatBufferBuilder
 new VectorIter
 add FlatBufferBuilder::force_defaults API
 Optional Scalars
 up to 2018 edition
 possible performance speedup
 ... and minor breaking change to some APIs, for example: remove "get_", return Result.

Let's try this version.
